text:
Adnan al-Pachachi or Adnan Muzahim Ameen al-Pachachi () (May 14, 1923 – November 17, 2019) was an Iraqi politician and diplomat. Pachachi was Iraq's Permanent Representative to the United Nations from 1959 to 1965 and Foreign Minister of Iraq from 1965 to 1967 during the Six-Day War with Israel.
Pachachi died in Abu Dhabi on November 17, 2019 at the age of 96.
